metadata.title: CVE-2022-28203 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A denial-of-service issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.6, 1.36.xbefore 1.36.4, and 1.37.x before 1.37.2. When many files exist, requestingSpecial:NewFiles with actor as a condition can result in a very longrunning query.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
